data.text: This hotel is an elegant step back in time with all the modern amenities. We booked a junior suite which had ample space to unpack and relax and the bedding is sublime. The rooftop bar/pool is a must with breathtaking views of the Cathedral, Sangrada Familia, mountains, and harbor and, their croquettes and patatas bravas are some of the best we have had.  The concierge was extremely helpful booking a last minute tour and not only providing restaurant recommendations but making our reservations.  If you happen to be there Thur-Sat and enjoy live music and high end cocktails, make a reservation for the Speakeasy located below the lobby.  It was the perfect end to our week in Barcelona.
data.title: Perfect oasis of elegance

data.text: What an amazing hotel. We had a two-room suite which was spacious and well-appointed. As some have said, the inner courtyard view is nothing to write home about, but it didn't matter because the room was amazing and above all else...the service was exceptional. The friendliness of all the hotel staff and their willingness to help with anything was very much appreciated. The lobby is beautiful and relaxing. We didn't have a chance to really enjoy the rooftop because the weather was cold and wet, but the views from there are amazing. The layout was also very inviting.
data.title: Truly Great Hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Ellawinnie,

We would like to thank you very much for sharing your wonderful ratings and comments with us regarding your recent stay. 

We are elated to receive your positive feedback regarding our staff and our facilities,  since nothing makes us more joyful than knowing that we have achieved our main objective, which is no other than the satisfaction of our guests.

Looking forward to meeting you in the near future and to enjoy our Rooftop Terrace next time,

Sincerely,

Amal Al Naimi
Guest Relations Department
owner_response.author: Hotel El Palace

data.text: This is a fantastic hotel and I would have given it 5 stars, but for the fact that it needlessly nickel and dimes guests for stupid things.  For example, there is a nice breakfast buffet, but if you want to order fresh cooked eggs or an omelet there is a “surcharge.”  They give you two complementary bottles of water each day, but if you ask for any additional water they charge you.  Other than that, the hotel is beautiful, the room was very comfortable, the staff was great and the location is perfect.  Would stay there again in a minute.
data.title: A Palace in every sense

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Mrs. Ijloewy,

First of all, I would like to thank you for your visit at El Palace Barcelona and for your valuable comments.

It is our belief that guests should feel welcomed and comfortable throughout their stay.

Thank you for your comments, your feedback is received with understanding and that it contributes to ongoing efforts to ensure the satisfaction of all guests.

We hope to welcome in your next stay.

Our best regards
,

Albert Alonso
F&B Manager
owner_response.author: Hotel El Palace

data.text:
Great location, nice atmosphere, amazing breakfasts. 
The staff is friendly and very diligent. 
Special mention should be made of the concierge team - bravo! Rarely met such quality work. 
From minuses it is possible to note that rather old rooms and it is felt, well and would be desirable a little more sensitive service in a lobby bar (superfluous to your table will not come up). 
But overall the experience is very good and I can recommend it as a hotel for the whole family.
All the best 
Vladimir
data.title: Interesting hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Vladimir M, 

Thank you for choosing to stay with us at El Palace and for taking the time to share your feedback. We're delighted to hear that you enjoyed our great location, nice atmosphere, and amazing breakfast offerings. It's wonderful to know that you found our staff friendly and diligent, and we truly appreciate your special mention of our concierge team. 

Regarding your concerns about the rooms, we apologize for any inconvenience you experienced. We continuously strive to maintain and update our accommodations to ensure the comfort and satisfaction of our guests. Your feedback regarding the lobby bar service has been noted to make amends. 

We're thrilled that overall, you had a very good experience with us and that you would recommend our hotel to others, especially families. We value your patronage and hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back for another enjoyable stay in the near future.

Warm regards,

Daria Kabot
Guest Relations team
owner_response.author: Hotel El Palace

data.text:
Old European style with all the modern technological updates.  Our stay at El Palace couldn't have been more delightful.  The historic background of this hotel combined with its staff, modern conveniences and location were perfect!  Everyone on staff from those that checked us in to the outstanding concierges and bellhops went were outstanding. Our breakfast at the hotel was excellent as was the service in the general  restaurant and bar areas. The roof top bar offers a relaxing way to take in top of the city views.  The bed linens were oh so comfortable.
If you like old style ambience, detailed service and want the comforts technology has to offer this is the hotel for you!
data.title: Charming style and outstanding service

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear GoPalace826834,

Thank you ever so much for taking the time to share your delightful experience at El Palace. We are overjoyed to hear that you thoroughly enjoyed our establishment and modern amenities during your stay with us.

Our team takes immense pride in providing exceptional service, and it brings us great pleasure to know that our staff, from the receptionists to the concierges and bellhops, left such a positive impression on you. We continuously strive to ensure that every aspect of your stay exceeds expectations, and we are thrilled to learn that you found our breakfast, restaurant, and bar service to be excellent.

Your kind words about our old-style ambience, detailed service, and technological comforts mean the world to us. We are immensely grateful for your recommendation, and we eagerly anticipate the opportunity to welcome you back to El Palace for another memorable stay.

Warm regards,

Daria Kabot 
Guest Relations team
owner_response.author: Hotel El Palace
